name: Big'Un

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in Dungeons by 90.

skills.name: Head Splitter
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Attacks all enemies 1 time if the first attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +15%

skills.name: Forward Charge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Also has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +15%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Molten Slag
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Decreases the Turn Meter by 25%. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +15%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
